Interface IGuildChannel

    IChannel, ICreationTime, ISnowflake

    IChannelCategory, IGuildTextChannel, IGuildVoiceChannel

extends IChannel

        CompletableFuture<? extends IGuildChannel> edit(String name,
                                                int position,
                                                boolean nsfw)
                                         throws PermissionsException
        Changes the channels settings
        Parameters:
        name - The new name for the channel
        position - The new position for the channel
        nsfw - whether or not the channel is NSFW.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with a IGuildChannel if successful
        Throws:
        PermissionsException

      • overwritesOf

        List<IOverwrite> overwritesOf(IGuildMember member)
        Gets all of the channel's overwrites that applies to a IGuildMember
        Parameters:
        member - The member of whom we are looking for overwrites that apply.
        Returns:
        A List of IOverwrite objects.
        Since:
        April 7, 2017.

      • permissionsOf

        IPermission permissionsOf(IGuildMember iGuildMember)
        Evaluates the permissions for a member in the channel's Guild
        Parameters:
        iGuildMember - The member whose permissions we are evaluating.
        Returns:
        A new Permissions object that contains this, the member, and their evaluated permissions Integer.
        null if the channel doesn't belong to a Guild

      • setPermissions

        CompletableFuture<IOverwrite> setPermissions(int allow,
                                             int deny,
                                             IGuildMember member)
        Permission setting for a member in the channel's Guild 
         setPermissions(READ_MESSAGE & SEND_MESSAGE, 0x00000000, role);
        Parameters:
        allow - Raw integer representations for allowed permissions.
        deny - Raw integer representations for denied permissions.
        member - The IGuildMember to set an overwrite for.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with the member's new permission overwrite, if successful.

      • setPermissions

        CompletableFuture<IOverwrite> setPermissions(int allow,
                                             int deny,
                                             io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.guild.Role role)
        Permission setting for a member in the channel's Guild 
         setPermissions(READ_MESSAGE & SEND_MESSAGE, 0x00000000, role);
        Parameters:
        allow - Raw integer representations for allowed permissions.
        deny - Raw integer representations for denied permissions.
        role - The role to set an overwrite for.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with the role's new permission overwrite if successful.
